/usr/bin/c++    -rdynamic CMakeFiles/MotionVector.dir/draw_flow.cpp.o  -o MotionVector  -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/lib /usr/local/lib/libopencv_dnn.so.4.1.2 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_gapi.so.4.1.2 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_highgui.so.4.1.2 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_ml.so.4.1.2 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_objdetect.so.4.1.2 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_photo.so.4.1.2 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_stitching.so.4.1.2 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_video.so.4.1.2 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_videoio.so.4.1.2 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_imgcodecs.so.4.1.2 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_calib3d.so.4.1.2 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_features2d.so.4.1.2 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_flann.so.4.1.2 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_imgproc.so.4.1.2 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_core.so.4.1.2
